name: Name
accept-terms-required: Please accept the Terms and Conditions.
reset-password-desc: Please enter your email address. You will receive a link to create a new password via email.
home-subtitle: A great platform to buy, sell, and rent your properties without any agent or commissions.
about-description-1: Kiraale has developed a platform for the Real Estate marketplace that allows buyers and sellers to easily execute a transaction on their own. The platform drives efficiency, cost transparency and control into the hands of the consumers. Kiraale is Real Estate Redefined.
have-a-question: Have a question? Get in touch!
have-a-question-subtitle: We are here to help. Send us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact-success: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you shortly.
client-testimonials-subtitle: A great platform to buy, sell, and rent properties—directly or through trusted agents, with no hidden fees.
featured-properties-subtitle: Explore our curated selection of properties, handpicked to match your needs and lifestyle.
subscribe-subtitle: Subscribe to get latest updates and information.
pre-purchase-desc: Before starting your property search, it's essential to determine your budget. Being financially prepared can help you act quickly when you find the right property.
schedule-a-showing-desc: Viewing properties in person lets you assess their condition, layout, and surroundings. Schedule a showing to explore properties that meet your needs.
submit-an-offer-desc: Once you've found the perfect property, submitting an offer is the next step. This involves proposing a price and terms that work for both you and the seller.
property-inspection-desc: A property inspection helps identify any issues before purchasing. This ensures you're aware of the property's condition before finalizing the deal. Seek professional inspection to avoid unexpected surprises.
appraisal-desc: An appraisal helps determine the property's market value, ensuring that the price you pay aligns with its worth. Consult a professional appraiser to get an accurate valuation.
closing-deal-desc: The closing process involves finalizing the paperwork, transferring ownership, and receiving the keys to your new property.
price-your-property-desc: Setting the right price is key to attracting buyers. Research similar properties in your area to ensure your pricing is competitive.
prepare-your-home-desc: First impressions matter. Clean, declutter, and make necessary repairs to present your home at its best.
list-your-property-desc: Listing your property on Kiraale helps you reach more buyers. Highlight key features and use high-quality photos.
schedule-showings-desc: Allow potential buyers to visit your property. Flexible scheduling can increase interest and speed up the selling process.
review-offers-desc: When offers come in, evaluate the price and terms carefully. Consider both the offer amount and the buyer's ability to close quickly.
finalize-sale-desc: Once you accept an offer, the final step is signing the paperwork, transferring ownership, and receiving payment.
about-matching-description: We connect buyers with sellers and renters with landlords, making property transactions quick and easy.
about-automation-description: From listings to payments, our platform automates the process, ensuring efficiency and convenience.
about-listings-description: Discover a variety of properties tailored to your needs, with updated listings and transparent pricing.
services-subtitle: We simplify real estate transactions with a range of professional services.
services-matching-desc: We connect buyers with sellers and renters with landlords for seamless transactions.
services-listings-desc: Easily list and manage properties with our automated system.
services-payments-desc: Safe and transparent payment processing for hassle-free transactions.
services-insights-desc: Get real-time property market trends and price evaluations.
services-management-desc: We provide comprehensive property management services to ensure your property is well-maintained and profitable.
services-security-desc: We prioritize data security to protect your personal information and ensure safe transactions.
services-support-desc: Our team is always available to assist you with your property needs.
subject: Subject
favorite-properties-description: Here you will find all your favorite properties. You can easily manage them and contact the sellers.
no-favorite-properties-description: You haven't added any properties to your favorites yet. Start exploring properties and favorite the ones you like, you will find them here.
add-property-desc: Add your properties to reach more buyers and renters.
property-add-failed: Failed to add property. Please try again.
upload-property-image: Upload Your Property Images Here. (Min 4 images/Videos)
image-upload-info: Supports JPG, PNG and MP4 videos. Max file size : 10MB.
minimum-4-images-required: At least 4 images are required. Please upload more images first then delete the others later.
no-properties-description: We couldn't find any properties matching your search criteria. Please refine your search term and criteria then try again.
property-not-found-description: The property you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
no-featured-properties-found-description: We couldn't find any featured properties. They will available soon.
feature-subtitle: Discover a seamless process for buying, selling, or renting properties, whether directly or through trusted agents.
feature-evaluate-description: Explore property details, compare prices, and assess value to make informed decisions.
feature-agent-description: Schedule meetings with agents to discuss property options and gain insights.
feature-deal-description: Finalize negotiations and complete the property purchase or rental for a smooth transaction.
sell-subtitle: Follow these simple steps to list your property, attract buyers, and close the deal quickly.
sell-prepare-description: Clean, declutter, and make necessary repairs to ensure your property is ready for showings.
sell-list-description: List your property online with high-quality photos and highlight its best features to attract buyers.
sell-close-description: Review offers, negotiate terms, and finalize the sale by signing the paperwork and transferring ownership.
subscribe-success: Thanks for subscribing! You will receive the latest updates and information.
subscribe-error: An error occurred while subscribing. Please try again later!
address-info: Maka Al-Mukarramah Road, Waaberi District, Mogadishu, Somalia
Search-address-property: Search address, property or business name
what-we-do-subtitle: We simplify property transactions by connecting buyers, sellers, renters, and landlords seamlessly.
privacy-overview-description: At Kiraale, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you interact with our platform. Whether you are searching for properties, listing a home, or managing rental agreements, we ensure that your data is handled with the utmost security and transparency. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information as outlined in this policy. We continuously update our privacy practices to comply with regulations and to enhance your user experience.
privacy-use-1: Enhance user experience and improve our services
privacy-use-2: Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
privacy-use-4: Send updates, promotions, and service notifications
privacy-use-6: Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
privacy-info-description: We collect personal and transactional data to provide a seamless real estate experience. This includes contact details, property preferences, payment history, and communications with buyers, sellers, or landlords. Information may also be gathered from third-party services such as payment processors and analytics tools to improve our services. We do not sell your data to third parties, and access is restricted to authorized personnel only. Your data helps us personalize your experience, facilitate transactions, and ensure compliance with legal requirements. You have full control over your information, with options to review, update, or request deletion at any time.
terms-introduction-text: Welcome to Kiraale. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to comply with our Terms and Conditions. These terms outline the rights and responsibilities of users engaging with our property listings, ensuring fair and secure transactions for all parties involved.
terms-user-agreements-text-1: Users must provide accurate information when listing or searching for properties. We reserve the right to suspend or remove accounts engaging in fraudulent or misleading activities.
terms-user-agreements-text-2: By using our platform, you acknowledge that all transactions between buyer and seller or landlord and tenant are organized by the involved parties, and Kiraale is not responsible for financial disputes between buyers and sellers or landlords and tenants.
terms-user-agreements-text-3: Users are responsible for verifying property details, conducting due diligence, and ensuring compliance with legal requirements before finalizing transactions.
terms-user-agreements-text-4: Kiraale is not liable for any damages, losses, or disputes arising from property transactions conducted through our platform.
terms-user-agreements-text-5: We reserve the right to update or modify our Terms and Conditions at any time. Users will be notified of any changes, and continued use of our platform implies acceptance of the revised terms.
terms-restrictions-text: You are specifically restricted from engaging in the following activities:
terms-restriction-1: Posting false or misleading property details
terms-restriction-2: Using the platform for illegal activities
terms-restriction-5: Violating any laws governing property transactions in Kenya
terms-faq-title-1: How does the Kiraale platform work?
terms-faq-content-1: Our platform connects buyers and sellers or landlords and renters for property transactions. Buyers or renters can browse available properties, contact sellers, and negotiate directly for a seamless experience.
terms-faq-title-2: Do I need an agent to list or buy a property?
terms-faq-content-2: No, you can list or browse properties independently. However, if you need assistance, you can connect with local agents through our platform for guidance and negotiations.
terms-faq-title-3: What do I need to do to start selling?
terms-faq-content-3: To list a property, create an account, provide accurate details, upload high-quality images, and set a competitive price. Ensure you have legal ownership and necessary documents for a smooth transaction.
terms-faq-title-4: What happens when I receive an inquiry on my listing?
terms-faq-content-4: When a potential buyer contacts you, respond promptly with the requested details. Arrange viewings at a secure location and ensure due diligence before proceeding with any transaction.
pricing-rental-feature-2: Easily edit or remove property details
pricing-sale-feature-2: Easily edit or remove property details
contact-phone-description: Reach us anytime for inquiries and support. Our team is here to assist you.
contact-email-description: For assistance or business inquiries, send us an email.
contact-location-description: Visit our office for personalized support and answers to your questions.
contact-location-address: Maka Al-Mukarramah Road, Waaberi District, Mogadishu, Somalia
my-properties-description: Manage your property listings, favorite them, mark them as sold or leased, and edit or delete them.
deactivate-account-desc: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? Your account will be marked for deactivation, however you can always reactivate by simply logging back in.
something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
account-deactivation-successfully: Account successfully deactivate. You can reactivate by logging back in.
invalid-file-type: Invalid file type. Please upload a valid image file.
images-saved-go-to-payment: Images saved successfully. You can now proceed to payment to complete your listing.
images-saved-go-to-my-properties: Images saved successfully. You will be navigated to "My properties" page in the dashboard to view your property.
